headline: 2025-10-28 — An Australian AI startup developing crewless-boat software was granted 1 AUKUS exemption licence (1 licence).
2025-10-28 — The same Australian AI startup gained permission to share information with defence contractors in 2 countries (United States and Britain).
2025-10-27 — ADNOC announced it will apply highly autonomous agentic AI in the energy industry in partnership with 3 firms (G42, Microsoft, AIQ).
2025-10-27 — ADNOC CEO Sultan Al Jaber said on Monday that this will be ADNOC's first-time application of highly autonomous agentic AI (1 first-time application).

2025-10-29 — Business executives and researchers at the Reuters NEXT conference in New York predicted 2 topics (autonomous 'agents' and profitability) will dominate the AI agenda next year (2 topics).
2025-10-29 — Combined signals from defence reporting and ADNOC's announcement indicate at least 2 sectors (defence and energy) are set to deploy autonomous agents (2 sectors).
